Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory262.png'}
{3: "Ayla finished her script. After another round of game, all the players received the WGAA's invitation. The project has come to the most crucial part."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory528.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory528.jpg'}
{3: 'It is a very sight in Babylonia. Members from different forces and squads have all gathered in the studio managed by WGAA.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Noctis, those two lanterns need to be a little higher.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Alright, I'll lift them up... What are you doing?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "No. 21 is holding two candles up high on tiptoes, trying to reach the lantern in Noctis' hand."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want to, put them, inside the lantern.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Just wait for me to finish hanging the lantern first.', 4: '2'}
{3: "No. 21 gives the candles to her Co-Bot. Noctis tries to cast it away, but it continues to climb up Noctis' head."}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey, what are you doing?! Watch out! I can't see!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With a candle in each hand, Noctis cannot take the Co-Bot off himself.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I used all the feats on that sword attack. Super critical, super strength... And every roll was critical success. It's been a long time since they ever had such a powerful attack in the system record.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Member', 3: "Yeah, and it landed right on my face. 48 damage. They couldn't even take my body off the ground.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Who would have thought I rolled a critical failure on the hit check? Was that lucky or unlucky...?', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Kamui is helping Wanshi to put on a "bush" costume. Rumor has it that in a subsequent patch, Wanshi managed to stay stealth in an area for 7 days thanks to this camouflage. When he woke up, he successfully defeated the Demon King who was on patrol.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Why was Wanshi able to one-shot the Demon King, but I wasn't allowed to?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Probably because you were using a gun, while I was using a crossbow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Do you call that thing a crossbow? It's a ballista, and it takes up more space than you!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What are you going to do with the wall? Should I make a simple replica to replace it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Inside the room? Did you just learn performance art from the WGAA?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Tch... I'll build a scaffold then. Special effects alone won't be enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Don't worry, my effects are flawless with Ayla's guidance.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'In front of the terminal used for scene simulation and after effects, Karenina and Teddy are discussing the performance. Liv walks to them and hands over a few rice dumplings.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'We plan to give them out as festival souvenirs after the performance. Could you please taste them and let us know if any improvement can be made?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla looks at the joyful scene. Occasionally, she would also stop tapping on the terminal and chuckle.'}
{2: "I'll call that a great success.", 3: '57'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "They have always been fighting together, but sometimes they still ignore each other. It's a strange feeling.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Maybe that's just what friends are. There may be some misunderstanding in the beginning, but eventually everything will turn out to be alright.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Still, I think it is important to voice out our feelings. It is crucial for us to realize and acknowledge the importance of our friends.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You nod without answering. The center of the room has become a noisy site.'}
{3: 'Karenina and Teddy are arguing again. No. 21 is holding her Co-Bot and running between others to run from Noctis. Lee and Wanshi are discussing where to place the ballista.'}
{3: 'Before you realize it, you already have so many comrades to fight alongside.'}
{3: "It's time to dress up as an apple tree. Lucia is calling you with a smile."}
{2: "I shouldn't have used the camouflage skill in the story.", 3: '70'}
{3: 'Ayla takes a step forward, then turns sideways and reaches out to you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Let's go, Commandant. Everyone's waiting.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, right. I'm sure we will get busier later, so I'll say this to you now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Happy Dragon Boat Festival, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
